node.text: Our Virtual Skillet 6 Ways event where we discussed all things Skillet and its variants

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Cloaked in the tales of our past. Born from the visions of our future.

The Keeper's Veil. A Honey Saison Ale. An original banner carrier for the Burial brand is back in a package for the first time in years. Brewed with wildflower honey, @riverbendmalt Pilsner malt and wheat, with a touch of Vienna and honey malt this beer gets the majority of its floral nuance from the addition of a medley of dried herbs and flowers including hibiscus, chamomile, rose petals, passion flower, heather, lavender, and elderflowers. Enjoy lavender rose scones with a honey glaze and a fresh elderflower garnish. Elegantly delivered in clear glass, where the beer can evolve as you want it through intentional storage. 4pk/$13. 5.5%.

Put Youth Behind You. A Barrel-Aged Golden Sour Ale with Chokeberry and Lime. Our take on the blessed Cape Codder. A blend of neutral wine barrel-aged golden sour ales, aged 1 to 1.5 years, racked back to steel on top of spent chokeberries from Rebel Angels and some freshly-zested limes. Sip on iced cranberry cocktail, fresh blended citrus juices, and cranberry key lime pie. 4pk/$20. 6.5%.

Bottles and new Butterfly Balloon Stem release today at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/28 from 2-8pm and 7/31 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/29 at 12pm. Inspiration stares back at you from the faded depths of the bottom of your glass. And you gaze into the coffers with the aim to fill the space with something new.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @trilliumbrewing, @ansonmills, and @epiphanycraftmalt. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
An appreciative foray into the spectacle of growth. 

A Deeper Dissection of Harvest. A Double India Pale Ale. A guided path through the Heavy Resin we share with others for the very first time. The musings of collaborative schemes with @trilliumbrewing. Made with @ansonmills sorghum malted by @epiphanycraftmalt and sorghum syrup. Triple saturated with Mosaic Incognito and Cryo. Double dry-hopped with hand-selected Mosaic, Simcoe, Cashmere, and Enigma. Waves of raspberry blueberry sorbet atop slices of raspberry cream pie coated in bags of tropical skittles. 4pk/$20. 8.5%.

Our third and final offering for the keepers of heavy resin grail and @burialdtr's Heavy Resin takeover at The Exhibit Taproom this Friday, 7/30 where this grog will be served alongside some of the finest IPA's around.

Cans will release on 7/28 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/28 from 2-8pm and 7/31 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/29 at 12pm. Wade through the remnants of that which was discarded. For the arrival of a new season brings life in the wake of that which once was. Still more on the way.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of flower and text that says 'D BURIAL'.

node.text:
The distant glow of promise. An awakening for some, a reprieve for others. 

Perceptions of Carnage. A Double India Pale Ale. Our newest paddling down the river of Heavy Resin. Mashed with barley and oats and a touch of wheat. Whirlpooled with Incognito and Cryo. Double dry-hopped with Mosaic and Simcoe. Blenders of freshly cut pineapple, pineapple pixies and pineapple jujubes with a floater of resinous blueberry kush. 4pk/$19. 8.5%.

Cans and Carnage Rocks Glasses will release on 7/28 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/28 from 2-8pm and 7/31 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/29 at 12pm. Surreality at its purist. The fantastical depiction of the mundane is gently laid to rest. Still more resin on the way.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
The journeys we came to find, and the crossroads we were led to see. 

Excommunication from the Altar of Nonconformity. An Imperial Stout with Meyer Lemon Zest, Lemon Crystals, Dried Lemon Wheels, Shortbread, Cinnamon, and Madagascar, Tahitian, and Mexican Vanilla Beans. Our very first Heavy Resin Imperial Stout brings us into the dastardly world of triple saturation in dark ale crafting. Inspired by our love for lemon pound cake, we brought this into the resin realm by aging it upon three types of vanilla bean before a quick dosage of fresh cut Meyer lemon zest, dehydrated lemon juice and dried candied lemon wheels. Lean into wisps of lemon curd injected chocolate ganache, mocha spritzed with a twist, and dark chocolate lemon pixies. 500ml/$19. 14%.

Bottles will release on 7/28 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/28 from 2-8pm and 7/31 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/29 at 12pm. A finite interpretation of the boundaries that lay beyond reach. And a reckoning of conceptualization that pulled at our feet. These are the hymns of a million searchers. Hang tight. Resinous clouds are on the horizon.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink and outdoors.

node.text:
The offspring of the Burial tale. We've broken ground on our new South Slope property. 

Our new Buxton Ave brewery, shop, barrelhouse and @drinkvisuals wine bar will be dedicated to quality of craft, pushing the boundaries of creativity and the support of our local AVL community, all with a keen eye on our roots in the South Slope. Stick with us as we'll be rolling out details on our progress as the project unfolds. But rest assured, a rooftop deck is in our future. Cheers.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @adml.spaceship. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
The recurring abnormality of hypnotic visions. Trace remnants of a life lost.

Spectral Embrace of the Breathless. A West Coast-Style India Pale Ale. The latest dayglow meditation from our brewer @adml.spaceship. Made in the way of those that came before. Whirlpooled with Citra, Columbus, Centennial and El Dorado. Double dry-hopped with Citra, Centennial and El Dorado. Orange dream bars dosed with candied mango and pineapple pixie sticks and finished with a thunderhead of Citrus Kush. 7%.

Swing through our AVL and @burialdtr taprooms today and enjoy a pint of this righteous taproom only grog. Seek out the apparitions. For solace lies in wait.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
The evolution of a truth. The journey of introspection.

Seekers Aren’t We All. An India Pale Ale. The musings of our leader, Jess Reiser. After a lifetime of searching for her voice, she now has the reigns to evolve this series. And this time she brought it up a notch with the fine creativity of Diane Gooding at @goodingfarms, who invented the righteously delicious Idaho Gem hop. Triple saturated in the whirlpool with Incognito and Cryo. Double dry-hopped with hand-selected Mosaic and Idaho Gem, and dusted with some Mosaic Cryo. Jugs of blue raspberry icees topped with crushed blueberry jolly ranchers and a misting orange zest. 4pk/$18. 7.2%.

Cans will release on 7/21 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/21 from 2-8pm and 7/24 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/22 at 12pm. A way to step into the light. Cheers.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Where ministrations that moved our feet, became the discombobulated musings of rampant degradation.

A Curious Volume of Forgotten Lore. A Triple India Pale Ale. Triple saturated with Mosaic Incognito, Cryo and Pellets. Triple dry-hopped with our two different hand-selected Mosaic lots and a touch of Mosaic Cryo. Scoops of mango pineapple sorbet topped with candied orange wheels and indica gummies. 4pk/$21. 10%.

Cans and Forgotten Lore Tees will release on 7/21 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/21 from 2-8pm and 7/24 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/22 at 12pm. The depiction of status quo laid to rest gently at the door. Inside this space, the utterly bizarre was fantastically the pleasantly mundane. Still more to come.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Things come and things go. Such is the balance of life.

A Brilliantly Deformed Corpse Nevertheless. An Stout Imperial Stout with Cherries, Roasted Pistachio, Cocoa Nibs and Vanilla Bean. Born out of our longing for Spumoni and our lust for far off lands, this stout was made with house-roasted Pistachios, massive doses of French Broad Cocoa Nibs, Madagascar Vanilla Bean and Northwestern Dried Bing Cherries. Melt into slices of molten chocolate cake drizzled with cherry glaze and scoops of pistachio ice cream. 500ml/$19. 15%.

Bottles will release on 7/21 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/21 from 2-8pm and 7/24 from 12-4pm. No distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/22 at 12pm. Into the void wind the finest memoirs. Hang with us. More on the way.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Forestry Camp with @drinkvisuals, and @forestrycamp. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Vibrant refractions of a life less known. The welcome embrace from the realm in which we thrive. 

VISUALS 004. An elusive and finely aged Spontaneous Aperitif Ale from a now bygone era when @drinkvisuals was a single barrel beer project. Way back in 2017, we filled a single oak barrel with wort and drove it out to @ladyluckgardens to stuff it with freshly picked edible flowers. We then allowed the wort to spontaneously ferment with the natural yeast on the flowers for over a year. Bottled in 2018, it rested in the depths of @forestrycamp until now. Naturally wild and tart, highly botanical, innately intriguing and packed with the true flavor of the WNC mountains. 500ml. 6%.

We've plucked these bottles from the catacombs exclusively for Acid Camp, our celebration of all things mixed fermentation. The festivities kick off tomorrow (7/16) at @forestrycamp at 5pm with 10 dedicated sour taps from some of the best in the sour game followed by music with @phantompantone and @avl.xlr from 6-9PM. We'll be in killer company with draft offerings from @allagashbrewing, @cascade.brewing, @foragerbrewery, @highlandparkbrewery, @hudsonvalleybrewery , @jesterkingbrewery, @otherhalfnyc, @therarebarrel, @threesbrewing and @trvebrewing. To wrap up the weekend, Forestry Camp will feature an Acid Camp Brunch menu at the Outpost on Sunday from 12-4PM.

Bottles of VISUALS 004 are only available as part of our Acid Kit which includes the VISUALS 004 bottle, new Acid Camp Stem, Acid Pellicle Tee and a pre-selected flight of sours. $75 gets you everything. Available only at Forestry Camp. Swing through Forestry Camp this weekend, join for some fine grog and gnosh and take in the spectacle that is Acid Camp.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co. with @cloudwaterbrew. May be an image of drink and text that says 'BURIAL BURIAL'.

node.text:
An abstract existence fueled by recollection. 

A Canvas of Fragmented Memoirs. An India Pale Ale with Coconut and Lime. A modern communication, vocalized through the lens of our well-missed friends at @cloudwaterbrew. Made with macaroon coconut and fresh lime zest, and whirlpooled with Incognito. Double dry-hopped with Motueka, Cashmere, Sabro, and a dose of Idaho 7 Cryo. Dive into pitchers of margaritas sipped through a coconut tiki chalice chased with clouds of tropic thunder. 4pk/$18. 7.3%.

Cans will release on 7/14 at 12pm for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/14 from 2-8pm and 7/17 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/15 at 12pm. They may be excremental particles of times better spent. But still they define the brilliant interweaving of the finer days, and the people who lifted them up.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Burial Beer Co. in Burial Beer Co.. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
The prestige of elegance through the veil of simplicity. 

Contrition Pils. Our beacon of existence returns. As always, made with a decoction of 100% German Pilsner malt to maximize the capability of this remarkable grain. Hopped extensively in our whirlpool with Grungeist, Saaz and Hallertau Blanc. Welcome warm loaves of crusty Sourdough, clouds of lemon zest, freshly cut hay and hints of dank. 4pk/$13. 4.8%.

Cans available now for online presale for pickup at our AVL, DTR and CLT taprooms. You have 5 days to snag them from purchase in AVL and @burialdtr. Pickup for all online preorders at The Boutique in @burialclt will be on 7/14 from 2-8pm and 7/17 from 12-4pm. Limited distro. We will release any remainders on the shop for limited shipping on 7/15 at 12pm. For among the catacombs of our prized memoirs, we shall uncover this humble offering.
